name: Train Zombies
description:
Over the holiday break I made a little AI demo, and my 6yo son asked me to turn it into a game about zombies and trains (two things he likes). I may eventually port this project to mobile, so my son can play it on his iPad, but for now the controls are designed for either keyboard or a dual-stick gamepad (I have a PS4 controller connected to my computer via USB).

The keyboard controls are:

Arrow keys to move

Mouse to look around

Space to jump

Left Alt to attack
